LanguageData.Weiss_SummonBoar.label: 召喚獠牙野豬
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonBoar.description: 召喚我方獠牙野豬,持續時間很短.
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonArmaGigas.label: 召喚武巨靈
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonArmaGigas.description: 召喚我方武巨靈 (沒有持劍),持續時間很短.
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonArmaGigasSword.label: 召喚武巨靈(持劍)
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonArmaGigasSword.description: 召喚我方武巨靈(持劍),持續時間很短.
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonLancer.label: 召喚女王索矛蜂
LanguageData.Weiss_SummonLancer.description: 召喚我方索矛蜂,持續時間很短.
LanguageData.Weiss_TimeDilationGlyph_Summon.label: 時間延遲
LanguageData.Weiss_TimeDilationGlyph_Summon.descripti: Summon a time dilation glyph that slows every pawn near it.
